file_content.text: This is an incredible find. A man could make his career studying this.
Stealing is one thing, but how can you condone murdering a creature that might be sentient?
You're very generous, indulging Cera like this.
What does a crushed skeleton care what happens to its necklace?
We'll keep that little secret just between us.
If anyone's alive in that pipe, shooting them would be a mercy.
Skeleton number four thousand, six hundred and one. Complete.
